body.name: CWLAKON Wood Stove Fan 60° Oscillating Large Size, 5 Blades Heat Powered Stove Fan, Silent Eco Stove Top Fans with Thermometer, Non Electric Fireplace Fan for Gas, Pellet, Wood Burning Stove
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
features: Optimal Oscillation: With a 60-degree wide-angle oscillation, this wood stove fan efficiently circulates warm airflow throughout your room, ensuring an even distribution of heat. Covering more areas in the room, it prevents heat from rising straight up or flowing only forward. This adjustable oscillation stove fan allows you to heat the room quickly and evenly.

Large Size & Moves More Air: With 5 large blades and built-in double chips, this woodstove fan is much more powerful, creating a larger air volume and maximizing the circulation of hot air. The maximum airflow of up to 330 CFM. this wood burning stove fan effectively spreads a warm and comforting breeze throughout your home.

Heat Powered Stove Fan: No batteries or electricity required, this fireplace fan is powered by heat from the stove surface to spin. Auto start-up temperature is as low as 140°F (60°C), and higher temperatures lead to faster rotation (Don’t exceeding 650°F / 345°C). This wood burner fan can reduce wood consumption and lower heating costs. A perfect wood stove accessory for winter.

Silent Operation: With newly designed large reinforced 5 blades, this heat powered fan helps circulate warm air to raise the temperature, and it runs whisper quiet. You will feel the warmth without even noticing the stove fan is there.

Premium Quality & Durable: Made of anodized aluminum, this heat powered fan can resist high temperatures up to 650°F (345°C). No deformation, rusting, or discoloration even after prolonged operation in high temperatures.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large size oscillating wood stove fan distributes heat much more efficiently 60° oscillation allows this oscillating stove fan to cover a wider area in the room. It effectively helps circulate the warm air around and keeps it from rising straight up or just going straight forward.

Trust the Experts Designed by British experts, CWLAKON has over 12 years of experience in fan production, known for its high quality and efficiency. With its innovative and unique design, our stove fan serves as an elegant room decoration and makes for a great gift for friends. Never Stop Improving Our manufacturer is experienced and continually enhances the product based on customer feedback every year. We have developed multiple products to better accommodate various room sizes. Aim for Your Contentment You don't need to worry about the durability of our products. We offer one year of free maintenance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Works evertime (not operating during video as no fire build currently). Appears to be very good quality.Don’t expect “feeling” much air flow, none of these operate at that level that I know of. But they do move air and help to spread the heat around and with no additional electricity cost and with absolutely no noise! This is huge as anyone who has a built-in fan in their stove will tell you even the quieter ones are annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heat driven woodstove fan is excellent, performs exactly as described.
reviews.reviewText: This is our first woodstove fan driven by the heat of the stovetop. We put it to use immediately and are in awe how soon it begins spinning as the stove warms, attesting to the craftsmanship for heat transfer. At full speed it's silent and yet pushes many cubic feet of warmed air out into the family room every hour. We love it. We highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well / not silent
reviews.reviewText: I do actually really like this fan. My experience with this fan is that it actually does create some airflow. I'm not talking a box fan or ceiling fan or anything. But from 5' away I can feel a draft. Pair that with a a ceiling fan in the next room and the two together move the heat throughout my entire upstairs living space. The only thing that disappoints me is that it now makes a rattle sound. It was totally silent the first two uses and now rattles. It's not a big deal to me. But when it's advertised as silent, and is silent at first, it's a bummer when it makes noise. Its not that terrible of a rattle though. That's the only reason I deducted a star. Otherwise it seems quite reliable. Oh and the oscillation is wonderful. This little guy starts spinning and oscillating when it's thermometer hits 190° every time. As soon as it starts spinning I know my wood stove is ready to latch the door. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Circulates heat better than I expected, very efficient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty good
reviews.reviewText: Good price for a device that works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The fan itself is quiet but it does absolutely nothing when it comes to moving heat. How can it? It’s got very little power, barely feel air movement when my hand is 3” from it!!To check I placed a thermostat in the middle of the room ( 12’) from the fan. Noted the temp before fan, then placed the fan on the wood stove, after an hour there was no difference in temperature. If the fan was doing its job it would be moving the hottest air from the stove into the room . It does NOT! It’s virtually useless and I don’t know how people review anything otherwise!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not impressed with fan power
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It does blow the heat a little bit. The fan does move and is quiet for now. A couple of the fins were bent backwards against the unit, so it would not move when I first pull it out of the box, got it as straight as I could. Not sure about the longevity of the quietness of it because of the fins. But it’s a cool little feature and I’m sure it moves the heat a little bit. You can’t feel it from more than 10 or less inches away though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does what it says it will do. Works great.

Ich hätte nicht gedacht dass dieser kleine Ventilator so gut funktioniert. Gefühlt verteilt sich die Wärme deutlich besser. Eine Flamme mit dem Feuerzeug flackert bis ca. 0,5m vor dem Rotor. Das Gerät arbeitet absolut geräuschfrei. Das Gerät kann ich nur weiterempfehlen.
bis jetzt sehr zu frieden, Verteilung der Wärme geht in Ordnung
Réception en avance.Fonctionne bien à partir de 80 ° C.Silencieux, mais peu de mouvement d'air.

Eine perfektes Gadget. Durch den kontinuierlichen Luftstrom sorgt der Lüfter für eine gleichmäßige Verteilung der warmen Luft. Der Lüfter ist allerdings nur für Festbrennstoff Ofen geeignet. Bei Pellets oä. reicht die obe Oberflächen Temperatur nicht aus.
